paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses a case of a patient with a germline BRCA2 pathogenic variant and provides details on the variant, patient demographics, penetrance data, and clinical significance.

individual_records.phenotype_details: bilateral breast carcinoma with metastasis in the fimbrial part of the left Fallopian tube
individual_records.evidence_sentence: We present a case of a 47-year-old patient with bilateral breast carcinoma with a germline BRCA2 pathogenic variant.

functional_data.summary: The variant was confirmed through genetic testing.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is confirmed as pathogenic and is associated with the patient's breast cancer.
variants.additional_notes: The patient is currently in complete remission.
key_quotes: The final histological report identified a metastasis of a poorly differentiated carcinoma, which was CK7 and GATA3 positive, and CK20, PAX-8, WT1 negative.

tables_processed.table_caption: Variants detected in three different tumor samples of the same patient.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the BRCA2 variant was successfully extracted.
